context.contactHeadline: Software Engineer @Autonoma | AI √ó SEO √ó Growth Marketing
context.contactAbout:
2+ years in software development, skilled in frontend (HTML, JavaScript, React, Next.js), backend (C#, Node.js, Flask, MySQL), and cloud technologies (Docker, AWS, Firebase, Heroku). Experienced with project tools like Git, Jira, Figma, and PowerBI, and have a foundation in machine learning using PyTorch and Google Colab.

As a junior software engineer, I leverage skills to drive impactful projects and support strategic decisions. Collaborating with cross-functional teams, I prioritize understanding client needs and elevate product design, full-stack development, performance optimization and reporting in industries such as laboratory and mining.

Beyond my work and studies, I‚Äôve led teams in several hackathons. These experiences honed my rapid learning, pressure management, and leadership skills, enabling me to deliver innovative, high-quality solutions and excel in project planning and presentations:)
